cienaCesOspfMIB.name: cienaCesOspfMIB
cienaCesOspfMIB.contactinfo: Mib Meister 115 North Sullivan Road Spokane Valley, WA 99037 USA Phone: +1 509 242 9000 Email: support@ciena.com
cienaCesOspfMIB.description: This MIB module is for the Extension of the OSPF MIB for CIENA Products

OspfOperStatus.name: OspfOperStatus
OspfOperStatus.description: The current operational state of an OSPF Protocol Manager entity.

cienaCesOspfRFC1583Comp.name: cienaCesOspfRFC1583Comp
cienaCesOspfRFC1583Comp.reference: OSPF Version 2, Section 16.4.1 External path preferences
cienaCesOspfRFC1583Comp.description: Indicates metrics used to choose among multiple AS-external-LSAs. When RFC1583Compatibility is set to TRUE, only cost is used when choosing among multiple AS-external-LSAs advertising the same destination. When RFC1583Compatibility is set to FALSE, preference is driven first by type of path using cost only to break ties. In order to minimize the chance of routing loops, all OSPF routers in an OSPF routing domain should have RFC1583Compatibility set identically. When there are routers present that have not been updated with the functionality specified in RFC2328 Section 16.4.1, all routers should have RFC1583Compatibility set to TRUE. Otherwise, all routers should have RFC1583Compatibility set to FALSE, preventing all routing loops.

cienaCesOspfOperStatus.name: cienaCesOspfOperStatus
cienaCesOspfOperStatus.description: The current operational state of OSPF.

cienaCesOspfOpaqueLsaSupport.name: cienaCesOspfOpaqueLsaSupport
cienaCesOspfOpaqueLsaSupport.description: The router's support for Opaque LSA types. This value cannot be changed when OSPF is active and operStatus is up.

cienaCesOspfTrafficEngSupport.name: cienaCesOspfTrafficEngSupport
cienaCesOspfTrafficEngSupport.description: The router's support for OSPF traffic engineering.

cienaCesOspfExtOpLsaCount.name: cienaCesOspfExtOpLsaCount
cienaCesOspfExtOpLsaCount.description: The number of type-11 LSAs in the external database.

cienaCesOspfExtOpLsaCksumSum.name: cienaCesOspfExtOpLsaCksumSum
cienaCesOspfExtOpLsaCksumSum.description: The 32 bit sum of LS checksums of all type-11 LSAs in the external Link State Database.

cienaCesOspfNumUpdPending.name: cienaCesOspfNumUpdPending
cienaCesOspfNumUpdPending.description: The number of pending updates to the Link State Database.

cienaCesOspfNumUpdMerged.name: cienaCesOspfNumUpdMerged
cienaCesOspfNumUpdMerged.description: The number of updates that have been merged into the Link State Database since the last routing calculation.

cienaCesOspfNumCksumsPending.name: cienaCesOspfNumCksumsPending
cienaCesOspfNumCksumsPending.description: The number of LSAs in the Link State Database which are now due to have their checksum checked.

cienaCesOspfCalcMaxDelay.name: cienaCesOspfCalcMaxDelay
cienaCesOspfCalcMaxDelay.description: The maximum delay before the routing table is recalculated following a change to the Link State Database. (Recalculation is delayed to reduce the frequency of recalculations of the routing table). This parameter has units of milliseconds. A value of 0 indicates that a routing calculation will immediately follow an update to the database.

cienaCesOspfAreaTable.name: cienaCesOspfAreaTable
cienaCesOspfAreaTable.reference: OSPF Version 2, Section 6 The Area Data Struc- ture
cienaCesOspfAreaTable.description: Information describing the configured parameters and cumulative statistics of the router's attached areas.

cienaCesOspfAreaEntry.name: cienaCesOspfAreaEntry
cienaCesOspfAreaEntry.description: Information describing the configured parameters and cumulative statistics of one of the router's attached areas.

cienaCesOspfAreaId.name: cienaCesOspfAreaId
cienaCesOspfAreaId.reference: OSPF Version 2, Appendix C.2 Area parameters
cienaCesOspfAreaId.description: A 32-bit integer uniquely identifying an area. Area ID 0.0.0.0 is used for the OSPF backbone.

cienaCesOspfAreaTransitCapability.name: cienaCesOspfAreaTransitCapability
cienaCesOspfAreaTransitCapability.description: This parameter indicates whether the area can carry data traffic that neither originates nor terminates in the area itself. This parameter is calculated when the area's shortest-path tree is built.

cienaCesOspfAreaRtrLsaCount.name: cienaCesOspfAreaRtrLsaCount
cienaCesOspfAreaRtrLsaCount.description: The number of LSAs with LS type-1 in this area's Link State Database.

cienaCesOspfAreaRtrLsaCksumSum.name: cienaCesOspfAreaRtrLsaCksumSum
cienaCesOspfAreaRtrLsaCksumSum.description: The 32 bit sum of LS checksums of all LSAs with LS type-1 in this area's Link State Database.

cienaCesOspfAreaNetLsaCount.name: cienaCesOspfAreaNetLsaCount
cienaCesOspfAreaNetLsaCount.description: The number of LSAs with LS type-2 in this area's Link State Database.

cienaCesOspfAreaNetLsaCksumSum.name: cienaCesOspfAreaNetLsaCksumSum
cienaCesOspfAreaNetLsaCksumSum.description: The 32 bit sum of LS checksums of all LSAs with LS type-2 in this area's Link State Database.

cienaCesOspfAreaSummLsaCount.name: cienaCesOspfAreaSummLsaCount
cienaCesOspfAreaSummLsaCount.description: The number of LSAs with LS type-3 in this area's Link State Database.

cienaCesOspfAreaSummLsaCksumSum.name: cienaCesOspfAreaSummLsaCksumSum
cienaCesOspfAreaSummLsaCksumSum.description: The 32 bit sum of LS checksums of all LSAs with LS type-3 in this area's Link State Database.

cienaCesOspfAreaSummAsLsaCount.name: cienaCesOspfAreaSummAsLsaCount
cienaCesOspfAreaSummAsLsaCount.description: The number of LSAs with LS type-4 in this area's Link State Database.

cienaCesOspfAreaSummAsLsaCksumSum.name: cienaCesOspfAreaSummAsLsaCksumSum
cienaCesOspfAreaSummAsLsaCksumSum.description: The 32 bit sum of LS checksums of all LSAs with LS type-4 in this area's Link State Database.

cienaCesOspfAreaNssaLsaCount.name: cienaCesOspfAreaNssaLsaCount
cienaCesOspfAreaNssaLsaCount.description: The number of LSAs with LS type-7 in this area's Link State Database.

cienaCesOspfAreaNssaLsaCksumSum.name: cienaCesOspfAreaNssaLsaCksumSum
cienaCesOspfAreaNssaLsaCksumSum.description: The 32 bit sum of LS checksums of all LSAs with LS type-7 in this area's Link State Database.

cienaCesOspfAreaOpLsaCount.name: cienaCesOspfAreaOpLsaCount
cienaCesOspfAreaOpLsaCount.description: The number of LSAs with LS type-10 in this area's Link State Database.

cienaCesOspfAreaOpLsaCksumSum.name: cienaCesOspfAreaOpLsaCksumSum
cienaCesOspfAreaOpLsaCksumSum.description: The 32 bit sum of LS checksums of all LSAs with LS type-10 in this area's Link State Database.

cienaCesOspfIfTable.name: cienaCesOspfIfTable
cienaCesOspfIfTable.reference: OSPF Version 2, Appendix C.3 Router interface parameters
cienaCesOspfIfTable.description: The OSPF interface table describes the interfaces from the viewpoint of OSPF.

cienaCesOspfIfEntry.name: cienaCesOspfIfEntry
cienaCesOspfIfEntry.description: The OSPF interface entry describes one interface from the viewpoint of OSPF.

cienaCesOspfIfIpAddress.name: cienaCesOspfIfIpAddress
cienaCesOspfIfIpAddress.description: The IP address of this OSPF interface.

cienaCesOspfAddressLessIf.name: cienaCesOspfAddressLessIf
cienaCesOspfAddressLessIf.description: For the purpose of easing the instancing of addressed and addressless interfaces, this variable takes the value 0 on interfaces with IP addresses, and the corresponding value of ifIndex for interfaces having no IP address.

cienaCesOspfIfLsaCount.name: cienaCesOspfIfLsaCount
cienaCesOspfIfLsaCount.description: The total number of link-local link state advertisements in this interface's link-local Link State Database.

cienaCesOspfIfLsaCksumSum.name: cienaCesOspfIfLsaCksumSum
cienaCesOspfIfLsaCksumSum.description: The 32-bit unsigned sum of the link-state advertisements' LS checksums contained in this interface's link-local Link State Database. The sum can be used to determine if there has been a change in the interface's Link State Database, and to compare the interface Link State Database of routers attached to the same subnet.

cienaCesOspfIfOperStatus.name: cienaCesOspfIfOperStatus
cienaCesOspfIfOperStatus.description: The current operational state of this interface.

cienaCesOspfIfNetMask.name: cienaCesOspfIfNetMask
cienaCesOspfIfNetMask.description: The subnet mask associated with the IP address of this entry. The value of the mask is an IP address with all the network bits set to 1 and all the hosts bits set to 0.

cienaCesOspfIfTransmitTimerDelay.name: cienaCesOspfIfTransmitTimerDelay
cienaCesOspfIfTransmitTimerDelay.description: The time this interface delays a LSU packet, in order to add more LSAs to the packet before sending. Setting this correctly can reduce the network traffic. This is configurable on a per-interface basis.
